Description: This ancestor is angered that Sweeper abused the Ancestor Sword.
Bats flutter about in dark places, in a mostly harmless manner.
A rampaging, lunging whirlwind of thick fur and sharp teeth and red, red eyes.
A massive creature of scales, muscle, and sharp glaring eyes.
How'd you get down here?  Go away, kitty
Cultists are crazed humans, sworn to protect and serve the Tyrant.
This cultist has struggled to the top of the Tyrant's dire ladder, and gained the strength necessary to lead.
A badger is a fierce little animal - oh, wait.  Maybe not that little.
Rats have thrived down here, and grown large and strong.
These underground snakes have somehow grown to the size of humans.
Ghouls are lost humans, on the very threshold of the undead world.
Grunts are dull-witted monsters that trod towards the nearest enemy, then thump away.
It's not as big an advantage as you'd think.
A giant mechanical stomper of a creature - slow, but unstoppable.
A tiny insect, mostly harmless; but sometimes it carries disease.
The Reaper is a powerful, relentless spirit, who chases the dawdling and idling.
A sentry doesn\'t move, but protects its space aggressively from any passers-by.
Being nothing but bones, a rattling old skeleton is its own armor.
A liquid body shrugs off swords, and energy blasts - humble, but difficult to kill.
Spectres are powerful ghosts, turned bitter and evil from loneliness.
THE TYRANT OF THE PIT ABSOLUTELY HAS TO DIE
The whirling, animated sword advances - slowly, but surely.
Zombies are slow, shuffling, and weak.. but they are almost never alone.
